It is a fun, unique fit. Definitely one of those dresses I'll be adjusting and pulling down all evening, but it's comfortable at the same time.  It has one strap on the right shoulder that is adjustable like a bra strap. The fabric color is as pictured on Amazon. My photos in the mirror show it as more of a watermelon red/pink, but it is a true pink color in person. I took one photo by my window, and that shows the color better. The fabric is thick enough so that it's not really transparent in the light. It will show a silhouette, but no details, so this has potential to be worn without undergarments. The fabric is a smooth, stretchy material, and the top is double-lined. For reference, I am 5'6", 140 lbs., somewhat athletic build. I bought a Medium in this dress.
it’s a cute dress i just decided to go with another option

Loved this so much!  For reference, I’m 5’7 and weigh 175 and got the xl and felt snatched!  It is short, but super cute and flirty.  The floral accents are delicate and beautiful.  Can’t wait to wear this out with my Hubby, it’s really gorgeous.
